titleStmt.title: Lectures vpon Ionas deliuered at Yorke in the yeare of our Lorde 1594. By John Kinge: newlie corrected and amended.
titleStmt.author: King, John, 1559?-1621.

titleStmt.title: Lectures vpon Ionas deliuered at Yorke in the yeare of our Lorde 1594. By John Kinge: newlie corrected and amended.
titleStmt.author: King, John, 1559?-1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ioseph Barnes, and are to be solde [in London, by Joan Brome] in Paules Church-yarde at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: "A sermon preached at the funeralles of the most Reuerend Father, John, late Arch-bishoppe of Yorke, Novem. the 17. in the yeare of our Lorde, 1494 [sic]" and "A sermon preached in Yorke the seuenteenth day of November in the yeare of our Lorde 1595" each have separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
The first leaf is blank except for a fleuron; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
